verbs.description: WASHINGTON ( AP ) — Rudy Giuliani 's revelation that [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: reimbursed] [ARG2: his personal attorney] [ARG3: for a $ 130,000 payment to a porn star to keep her quiet about an alle]
WASHINGTON ( AP ) — Rudy Giuliani 's revelation that President Donald Trump reimbursed his personal attorney for a $ 130,000 payment to a porn star to [V: keep] [ARG1: her quiet about an alle]
